column5: Who sells these?  I purchased some on sale a BPS a few years ago, but i havent seen any for sale since.  I lost a very productive lure, and want to replace it.
I still have 2 of them in my box that are very productive lures. I think I got mine a few yrs ago at the BPS spring classic for a great price.
I can only seem to find mine through harris sportsmail and the occasional time at bps
PM Marc Thorpe here. Savage Gear is one of Marc's sponsors.
they have some pretty funky top water action........gonna grab me a few of these.......
